item.description:
SATURDAY NOV 20 at 8 pm BRIGHTON BEACH MEMOIRS


Neil Simon draws a hilarious and poignant, semi-autobiographical portrait of a Jewish-American family, as seen through the eyes of 15-year-old Eugene Jerome, a fledgling writer who documents his observations in a daily journal. In between obsessing over girls and baseball, he paints a rich picture of his colorful relatives, all living together under one roof in post-Depression, pre-World War II Brooklyn.

"Simultaneously poignant and funny.‚Äù - Variety

"Hilarious comedy...His finest play...A delightful and enriching experience."-CBS-TV

FREE PARKING

Tickets are $25.00

Playhouse on Park
244 Park Road
West Hartford, CT 06119


Pick up your ticket before the show at the PREPARTY with the CT Theatre Group,
or at the will call window

Pre-Party and Post Party info will be emailed to all ticket holders


Visit http://www.CTTheatreG... or call (860) 987-7888
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet before and after the show to extend the party Details will be emailed to all Ticket Holders
